#### Switzerland
############

event = {
id = 996000
tag = { RUS SOV FRA CSA ENG HUN AUS U24 U25 ITA RSI VIC U08 U07 U23 USA TEX U31 U14 }
style = 2
persistent = yes

exists = SCH

}

control = { province = 392 data = -1 } #Bern
}

}

exists = SCH
local_flag = SWITZ_CONQ
}

control = { province = 391 data = -1 } #Geneva
control = { province = 392 data = -1 } #Bern
}

name = "The Annexation of Switzerland"
desc = "After fierce fighting in the Alpine Mountains, we have conquered and annexed Switzerland. The Swiss army has surrendered, and the territory is under our control, but the people are still resistant."
picture = "militaryparade1"
decision_picture = "decision_diplomatic_campaign"

date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
offset = 15

command = { type = dissent value = -5 }

}

command = { type = make_puppet which = SCH }
}
}

id = 11800122
country = RSI

command = { type = add_division which = "4a Divisione" value = infantry when = 10 }

command = { type = add_division which = "I. Squadriglia Torpediniere" value = destroyer when = 3 }

command = { type = add_division which = "Squadrone Sagittario" value = transport when = 1 }
command = { type = add_division value = interceptor when = 8 }

}
}

command = { trigger = { control = { province = 421 data = U25 } } type = trigger which = 11800132 }

}

name = "We will never accept your proposal!"

command = { type = relation which = U24 value = -100 }
command = { type = relation which = U25 value = -100 }
command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
}
}

#################

event = {
id = 11800138
tag = { CSA FRA RSI ENG U31 JAP GER UKR U24 U25 CHI CSX CHC MAN OTT }

trigger = {
government = communist
NOT = {
exists = SOV
}
control = { province = 572 data = -1 } #Moscow
OR = {
AND = {
country = CSA
NOT = { war = { country = CSA country = RUS } }
}
AND = {
country = FRA
NOT = { war = { country = FRA country = RUS } }
}
AND = {
country = RSI
NOT = { war = { country = RSI country = RUS } }
}
AND = {
country = ENG
NOT = { war = { country = ENG country = RUS } }
}
AND = {
country = U31
NOT = { war = { country = U31 country = RUS } }
}
AND = {

event = {
id = 3970022
country = POR
style = 2
picture = "diplomatic_campaign"

name = "A friendly government in Madrid"
desc = "We have installed a friendly government in Spain. Only question that remains is how much freedom shall we provide to this newly created state....."

action = {
name = "Great"
command = { type = trigger which = 3970026 }
}

action = {
trigger = { NOT = { alliance = { country = POR country = SPR } } }            #If NOT allied to the SPR
name = "Let's make sure their follow our interests"
command = { type = make_puppet which = SPR }
command = { type = secederegion which = SPR value = "Spain" }
command = { type = secedearea which = SPR value = "Canarias" }
command = { type = secedearea which = SPR value = "El Rif" }
command = { type = trigger which = 3970026 }
}
}

}
}

event = {
id = 62901
country = ITA
style = 2
picture = "militaryparade1"
decision_picture = "decision_diplomatic_campaign"
persistent = yes

decision = {
control = { province = 29 data = -1 }                # London is controlled by us
alliance = { country = EUS country = ITA }        # We must be allied to the Carlists
NOT = {
government = communist                             # Not syndicalist
exists = SCO
exists = U16                                                # England and Scotland don't exist
alliance = { country = CAN country = -1 }    # We're not allied to Canada
alliance = { country = U07 country = -1 }        # We're not allied to the UK
alliance = { country = GER country = -1 }        # We're not allied to Germany
war = { country = ENG country = -1 }             # We're not at war with the UoB
}
}

decision_trigger = {
}

trigger = {
control = { province = 29 data = -1 }                # London is controlled by us
OR = {
alliance = { country = EUS country = -1 }
alliance = { country = ITA country = -1 }        # We must be allied either to the Pope or to the Carlists
}
NOT = {
government = communist                             # Not syndicalist
exists = SCO
exists = U16                                                # Scotland or England don't exist
alliance = { country = CAN country = -1 }    # We're not allied to Canada
alliance = { country = U07 country = -1 }        # We're not allied to the UK
alliance = { country = GER country = -1 }        # We're not allied to Germany
war = { country = ENG country = -1 }             # We're not at war with the UoB
}
}

date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
offset = 15
deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1966 }

name = "The fate of Britain"
desc = "As our troops have landed in Britain and occupied London, local government leaders are petitioning our military authorities for the reestablishment of British independence."

action = {
trigger = { NOT = { exists = U07 } }    # UK doesn't exists
ai_chance = 50
name = "Create a loyal, United Britain"
command = { type = independence which = U07 value = 1 when = 0 }
command = { type = make_puppet which = U07 }
command = { type = trigger which = 62902 }
}
action = {
ai_chance = 50
name = "Independence for England and Scotland"
command = { type = independence which = SCO value = 1 when = 0 }
command = { type = make_puppet which = SCO }
command = { type = independence which = U16 value = 1 when = 0 }
command = { type = make_puppet which = U16 }
command = { type = secedeprovince which = U16 value = 21 }    # That other Welsh province
command = { type = secedeprovince which = U16 value = 22 }    # Cardiff
command = { type = trigger which = 62911 }
}
action = {
ai_chance = 1
name = "Total occupation of the isles is better for now"
command = { type = dissent value = 15 }
}
}

event = {
id = 62902
picture = "militaryparade1"
country = ITA
style = 2

name = "The new leader of Britain"
desc = "As we organize a new government of Britain, the establishment of a cabinet of colaborationist generals seemed as the most wise solution. However, Don Jacobo FitzJames Stuart, a Spanish Duke and descendent of the old Catholic House of Stuart has, for the first time, presented his claims to the British thrones. Despite Papal pressure, we should keep in mind that even the slight idea of a Catholic king is likely to set the British people into a heavy riot..."

action = {
name = "A new era for Britain - Restore the House of Stuart"
ai_chance = 90
command = { type = trigger which = 62903 }
command = { type = belligerence which = ITA value = 2  }
command = { type = relation which = CAN value = -50 }
command = { type = relation which = EUS value = 40 }
command = { type = relation which = VIC value = 20 }
}
action = {
name = "Stick to our original idea, setup a military cabinet"
ai_chance = 10
command = { type = trigger which = 62904 }
}
}

exists = U16                                                # England and Scotland don't exist

alliance = { country = U07 country = -1 }        # We're not allied to the UK
alliance = { country = GER country = -1 }        # We're not allied to Germany
war = { country = ENG country = -1 }             # We're not at war with the UoB
}
}

}

id = 77220
tag = { OTT EGY SAU LBY VIC FRA ENG RSI CAN USA GER TUR U07 RUS SOV CSA TEX IND AZB TRA GEO ARM PRK PAK CHI MON CXB SIK CHC CSX BHU AFG TIB JAP SIB MAN U31 KAZ NEP }

trigger = {
NOT = {
exists = PER
core = { province = 1085 data = -1 }
war = { country = -1 country = AFG }
war = { country = -1 country = KYG }
war = { country = -1 country = IRQ }

}

}

}

#########
#### Tibet
#########
event = {
id = 996014
tag = { USA TEX CSA RUS SOV JAP CAN VIC U07 U08 FRA ENG U31 CGX SIA BRU VIE PRK PAK IND GER }
persistent = yes

decision = {
control = { province = 1289 data = -1 }
NOT = {
local_flag = TIBC_CONQ
}
}

decision_trigger = {
NOT = {
exists = TIB
war = { country = -1 country = CYN }
war = { country = -1 country = CHI }
war = { country = -1 country = CSX }
war = { country = -1 country = CHC }
war = { country = -1 country = CXB }
war = { country = -1 country = SIA }
war = { country = -1 country = PRK }
war = { country = -1 country = PAK }
war = { country = -1 country = IND }
}
}

trigger = {
control = { province = 1289 data = -1 }
NOT = {
local_flag = TIBC_CONQ
exists = TIB
war = { country = -1 country = CYN }
war = { country = -1 country = CHI }
war = { country = -1 country = CSX }
war = { country = -1 country = CHC }
war = { country = -1 country = CXB }
war = { country = -1 country = SIA }
war = { country = -1 country = PRK }
war = { country = -1 country = PAK }
war = { country = -1 country = IND }
}
}

name = "Fate of Tibet"
desc = "After our successful campaign in the Tibetan Plateau we now have the task to establish new local administrative authority in order to restore peace, however there are several options for our choice...."
picture = "POWs"
decision_picture = "decision_diplomatic_campaign"
style = 2


date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
offset = 10
deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

action = {
name = "Continue with military occupation !"
ai_chance = 0
command = { type = local_setflag which = TIBC_CONQ }
command = { type = supplies value = 1000 }
}

action = {
ai_chance = 20
name = "Restore independent Tibet"
command = { trigger = { OR = { country = PAK country = PRK country = IND } } type = addcore which = 1278 }
command = { type = independence which = TIB value = 1 when = 0 }
command = { type = make_puppet which = TIB }
}

action = {
name = "Hand these territories to our loyal ally...."
ai_chance = 50
trigger = {
OR = {
alliance = { country = -1 country = CHI }
puppet = { country = CHI  country = -1 }
alliance = { country = -1 country = CSX }
puppet = { country = CSX  country = -1 }
alliance = { country = -1 country = MEN }
puppet = { country = MEN  country = -1 }
alliance = { country = -1 country = MAN }
puppet = { country = MAN  country = -1 }
alliance = { country = -1 country = CHC }
puppet = { country = CHC  country = -1 }
}
}

###################################
#### The Canadian Defeat by RUS ####
###################################

event = {
id = 740001
random = no
country = CAN
style = 2

trigger = {
war = { country = CAN country = RUS }
OR = {
AND = {
control = { province = 2108 data = RUS } # Ottawa
control = { province = 2111 data = RUS } # Toronto
control = { province = 2119 data = RUS } # Montreal
control = { province = 2126 data = RUS } # Quebec City
control = { province = 2132 data = RUS } # Halifax
control = { province = 2106 data = RUS } # Winnipeg, to show Russia is clearly advancing
}
AND = {
control = { province = 2089 data = RUS } # Vancouver
control = { province = 2106 data = RUS } # Winnipeg 
control = { province = 2108 data = RUS } # Ottawa
control = { province = 2111 data = RUS } # Toronto
control = { province = 2119 data = RUS } # Montreal
control = { province = 2126 data = RUS } # Quebec City, to show Russia is clearly advancing
}
}
control = { province = 572 data = RUS } # Moscow, to make sure Russians are in a position to dictate demands
control = { province = 553 data = RUS } # Petrograd, to make sure Russians are in a position to dictate demands
NOT = {
ispuppet = RUS
ispuppet = CAN
control = { province = 1832 data = CAN } # Chicago, to make sure the Canadians are not making heavy advances of their own against the CSA/AUS/PSA
}
}

name = "The Bitter Decision"
desc = "Once again Russian troops are marching on American soil, Ottawa lies in the hands of the Russian bear, along with much of Canada's industrial heartland. However it is only a matter of time before Canada's shattered armies give way and the Russians conquer all of us. To relieve its suffering, the country can only offer the unconditional surrender of all Canadian and Royalist forces"
picture = "American_Infantry"

date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
offset = 10
deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

action_a = {
name = "May God have mercy on us all! (Game Over)"
ai_chance = 95
command = { type = event which = 740002 where = RUS when = 2 }
}

action_b = {
ai_chance = 5
name = "For the king, there is still hope!"
command = { type = dissent value = 30 }
}
}

id = 740002
random = no
country = RUS
style = 2

The people are united in their jubilation. Russia now controls areas all over the northern hemisphere."
picture = "russianvictory"

name = "Victory at last!"
command = { trigger = { owned = { province = 2141 data = CAN } OR = { country = RUS country = SOV } } type = addcore which = 2141  }
